title: [Large-scale] Practical Understanding and Inquiry-Based Learning Design in Library and Information Science

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Library and Information Science Theory and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based learning strategy application for improving LIS major awareness among current practitioners, enhancing self-directed learning with personal devices.

learning_goals: Identify three or more core domains and practical applications in library and information science
Design solutions for real-world problems in the LIS field through inquiry-based learning (IBL)
Develop a self-directed learning plan to establish a 6-month LIS professional development roadmap

resources: LIS Practical Case Database (Library and Information Science)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
